Articles.Content:
You know there are 10 kinds of people in the world...

This is a tad late now, but I wanted to post a thread in celebration of reaching the 16th bit in the forum members count! The KSP Community is now over 32,768 strong! :w00t:

So as always, a massive [glow=green,2,300]thank you[/glow] for everyone who downloaded and purchased the game, and here\'s to reaching that 17th bit soon! :thumbup:

Cheers
Is there any gift for the 1000 000 000 0000th member ?

Well, my thanks go out to the whole team for creating such a great game! Currently having loads of fun with 0.16, and I\'m looking forward with unbearable anticipation to 0.17 and beyond! Keep up the awesome work.
I was like 'wtf' for a moment when I saw the title:) Awesome! Keep up the good work!
lol, 2^16 sales by 0.16.

Boss cried: 'Oh, where is the program we must have?!'

And fired one programmer, and then there were 0xFF

Congratulations ;D

You dont need to thank us, this is what happens when you (dev-team) put all of you on a project.

I really see an amazing future for KSP if you (dev-team) continue this way.
Awesome. Awesome that we can celebrate a totally random member count (in real numbers).

a thread in celebration of reaching the 16th bit in the forum members count! The KSP Community is now over 32,768 strong!

Such a geek.
I would of gone with 'KSP Forums - Now no longer 16 bit compatible'
Ive been here since almost the beginning. Its nice to see KSP growing this fast =P.
Yea KSP really had some potential which has been used to the max. In one year time it has been grown very fast.

But but... doesn\'t the forum use unsigned 16 bit numbers?

Since I can\'t see any negative posts anywhere!
If I become an astronaut I SWEAR I will bring a Kerbal plush with meh to space.
At first I was like 'WOO! WE BEAT MINECRAFT!' Then I relized thats a very high number, then I read the first line.... DOH!

After a few minutes of examining the title, and having major brainfarts,

Anyway congrats on 32,768 members (and counting)!!! The 1000 000 000 0000 must be in Kerbal mathematics
In a word - Binary.
Honestly I must congratulate the devs for making a great game. I\'ve been here since 0.14 and I love this game so much. The community is growing and I am having spectacular amounts of fun!

Congratulations!

I playing ksp for a long time, when I played for the first time, ksp was very small, KSP is growing faster and faster.

Exponential growth, baby.

Interest two players, who interest two more players, who interest two new player each...
Great job KSP! I have been following KSP for a while now, and like others have said, it\'s nice to see it grow.
